name: Fighting Spirit (crompo)
description:
Made by crompo in 48 hours for the GMTK 2021 Game Jam with the theme: "Joined Together".

Use your Fighting Spirit to defeat enemies and make your way through the dungeon!

(If the game doesn't load in your browser, try chrome or use the download if you're on Windows.)

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Look

Left Click - Attack

Spacebar - Eject Spirit (when Energy bar in top left is full!)

Land attacks on enemies to build Energy.

Credits:

Game and Art by crompo

Music is Rumble from https://www.bensound.com/

Sounds are all from freesounds.org (CC0) or https://sfxr.me/ (DrPetter, Eric Fredricksen, Chris McCormick)

Menu Font: Neuterous by Chequered Ink
